  /* HEADER  */
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  */
  .header {
    background-color: #f4f0e7;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 200;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.3);
  }
  .header h1 {
  	font-weight: 900;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 1;
    color: #FFF;
    display: inline;
    text-shadow: 0 0 3px rgba(0,0,0,.3);
    float: left;
    margin: 0;
  }
  .header .logo-img {
  	max-height: 65px;
    width: auto;
  }
  .header .navigation {
  	font-weight: 900;
    text-align: left;
    padding-top: 5px;
  }
  .header .navigation li {
  	display: inline-block;
  }
  .header .navigation li a {
  	float: left;
    display: block;
    padding: 20px 20px;
  	text-transform: uppercase;
    font-family: 'ProximaNova', sans-serif;
    color: #000000
  }
  .header .navigation li a:hover {
  	color: #cd8121
  }
  .header .social {
    text-align: right;
  }
  .header .social .padding {
  	padding: 20px 0;
  }
  .header .social li {
  	display: inline-block;
  }
  
  .row.mobile-navigation  {
  	position: absolute;
    background-color: #FFF;
  }
  .row.mobile-navigation ul li {
  	border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);
  }
  .row.mobile-navigation ul li:last-child {
  	border-bottom: none;
  }
  .row.mobile-navigation a {
  	display: block;
    font-size: 16px;
    padding: 10px 5px;
  }	
  
  @media only screen and (min-width: 40.063em) and (max-width: 64em) {

    	position: relative;
    }
    .header .navigation {

    }
    .header .navigation li a { 
    	padding: 20px 10px;
    }
  }
  @media only screen and (max-width: 40em) {

    	position: relative;
      padding-top: 20px;
    }

  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - */
  /* FEATURES  */
  /* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  */
  .pusher {
  	position: relative;
    z-index: 10;
    padding-top: 600px; /* 480 + header height */
  }
  .features {
    position: relative;
  }
  .features .row {
  	background-color: #ffffff;
  }
  .features .row .padding {
  	padding: 23px;
  }
  .features > ul {
  	text-align:center;
  }
  
  .features ul li {
  	position: relative;
  }
  .features ul li.active:after {
  	content:'';
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: -38px;
    left: 15px;
    width: 0; 
  	height: 0; 
  	border-left: 15px solid transparent;
  	border-right: 15px solid transparent;
  	border-bottom: 15px solid #fff;
  }
  .features .img {
  	background-color: #000;
  }
  .features .img a {
  	display: block;
    height: 1px;
    padding-top: 56.25%;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }
  .features .img a img {
  	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
  }
  .features .action {
  	margin-top: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }
  .features .action .button {
  	display: block;
    margin: 0 auto;
    font-size: 13px;
  
  }
  .features .action.can-purchase.can-rent .button,
  .features .action.has-monthly.has-yearly .button {
  	width: 47.5%;
    margin-right: 10px;
    padding: 16px 0;
    float: left;
  }
  .features .action .button.flush,
  .features .action.can-purchase.can-rent .button.flush,
  .features .action.has-monthly.has-yearly .button.flush {
  	margin-right: 0px;
  }
  .features .txt h4 {
  	font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 18px;
    line-height: 1.2em;
    text-align: center;
    color: #000000;
  }
  
  
  
  @media only screen and (min-width: 40.063em) and (max-width: 64em) { 
  	.features ul li.active:after {
    	display: none;
    }
  }
  
  @media only screen and (max-width: 40em) { 
  	.pusher {
    	 padding-top: 0px;
    }
  	.features ul li.active:after {
    	display: none;
    }
    .features ul li .button {
    	font-size: 11px;
    }
    .features .txt h4 {
    	font-size: 13px;
    }
    .features .action .button,
    .features .action.can-purchase.can-rent .button,
  	.features .action.has-monthly.has-yearly .button {
    	width: auto;
      margin-bottom: 5px;
      float: none;
      margin-right: 0;
    }
  }

  /* 
  KAGI MEDIA
  */
  
  var VHXJS = VHXJS || {};
  
  /* theme js object
  ---------------------------------------------*/
  VHXJS = {
  	mobilePaneHeight: 0,
    currentSlide: 0,
    catalogItemsPerPage: 12,
    carouselTimeBetweenSlides: 10000,
    carouselTimer: 0,
    searchInputValue: "",// comma delimited list of ID's from searching catalog
    searchValueInt: 0,
    
  	/* initiate
    ---------------------------------------------*/
    init: function() {
      this._bindScrollEvents();
      this._setupMobileNav();
      
  		// make mega slideshow fade out to bg color
      this._setupVignette();
      this._setupFeatures();
      this._bindScrollEvents();
  
      this._cleanUpMisc(); // just checks to make sure the footer img isn't set to blank src
    },
    _setupMobileNav: function(){
  		// popular mobile-navigation with items from regular nav
   	 $("ul.mobile-navigation").html($("ul.desktop-navigation").html());
     var paddingTop = parseInt( $("header").css("padding-top"));
     var hideFromView = ($("ul.mobile-navigation").outerHeight() + paddingTop + 1) * -1;
     $(".row.mobile-navigation").css("top",hideFromView);
  
  
  		// mobile nav click trigger
      $('header a.mobile-nav').click(function() {
        if (!$(this).hasClass("open")) {
          $('.mobile-navigation').animate({
            'top': 0
          }, 200);
          $('header').animate({
          	'padding-top': hideFromView * -1
          }, 200);
          $(this).addClass('open');
        } else {
          $('.mobile-navigation').animate({
            'top': hideFromView
          }, 200);
           $('header').animate({
          	'padding-top': paddingTop
          }, 200);
          $(this).removeClass('open');
        }
      });
    },
    _setupFeatures: function(){
    	var featureLimit = parseInt($("#features").data("limit")) - 1;
    	// destroy any package listing greater than 5 in the featured zone
      $(".features ul li:gt("+featureLimit+"), .mega ul li:gt("+featureLimit+")").remove();
      // pull the needed image assets in the featured carousel
      //$(".features ul li:eq(0)").addClass("active");
      // start the head carousel
      //VHXJS.showCarousel(VHXJS.currentSlide);
      //VHXJS.startAutoCarousel();
      
      // make featured options reveal carousel
      $(".features a.primary").click(function(ev){
      	var ind = $(this).parents("li").index();
       	VHXJS.showCarousel(ind);
        VHXJS.destroyAutoCarousel();
        
        return false;
        ev.preventDefault();
      });
      
      // navigator arrows
      $(".mega .navigation a").click(function(ev){
      	var navigateTo = 0;
      	if ($(this).hasClass("left")){
        	navigateTo = VHXJS.currentSlide - 1;
          if (navigateTo < 0){
          	navigateTo = $(".features li").length -1;
          }
        } else {
        	navigateTo = VHXJS.currentSlide + 1;
          if (navigateTo > ($(".features li").length-1)){
          	navigateTo = 0;
          }
        }
        VHXJS.destroyAutoCarousel();
        VHXJS.showCarousel(navigateTo);
      });	
      
      // if we have less than 5 entries in the carousel, adjust the HTML
      var packageCount = $(".features ul").children().length;
      if (packageCount < 5){
      	$(".features ul").removeClass("large-block-grid-5").addClass("large-block-grid-3");// + $(".features ul").children().length);
     	}
      // only ONE package? kill the section entirely
      /*if (packageCount == 1){
      	$(".features").hide();
        $(".mega .navigation").hide();
        $(".header a[href^='/#features']").parents("li").hide();
        VHXJS.destroyAutoCarousel();
      }*/
    },
    destroyAutoCarousel: function(){
    	clearInterval(VHXJS.carouselTimer);
    },
    startAutoCarousel: function(){
    	VHXJS.carouselTimer = setInterval(function(){ VHXJS.nextCarousel() }, VHXJS.carouselTimeBetweenSlides);
    },
    nextCarousel: function(){
      var navigateTo = VHXJS.currentSlide + 1;
      if (navigateTo > ($(".features li").length-1)){
  	   	navigateTo = 0;
      }
      VHXJS.showCarousel(navigateTo);
    },
    showCarousel: function(position){
    	$(".mega .intro").fadeOut();
   		// set var
      VHXJS.currentSlide = position;
    	// define our attributes
      var $slide = $(".mega ul li:eq("+position+")");
      var titles = $slide.find(".info .titles");
      var actions = $slide.find(".info .actions");
      var img = $slide.attr("rel");
      // animate the nameplate away
      $(".mega .nameplate").fadeOut("fast",function(){
      	$(".mega .nameplate")
        	.find(".titles .padding").html(titles.html()).end()
          .find(".actions .padding").html(actions.html()).end()
          .fadeIn("slow");
      });
      $(".mega .img").fadeOut("fast", function(){
        $(".mega .image .img").css("background-image","url("+img+")")
        	.fadeIn("slow");
      });
  
  		// move the arrow
      $(".features").find("li").removeClass("active").end().find("li:eq("+position+")").addClass("active");
    },
    _setupCatalog: function(){
    	// alphabetize the list
      $('.catalog ul>li').tsort('.txt h4');
      // make them all the same height (only way a grid works)
      VHXJS._cleanupCatalog();
      
      // setup Pagination
      VHXJS._setupPagination();
      // add the tooltipster
  		$(".catalog a.tooltipster").click(function(ev){ ev.preventDefault(); }).tooltipster({
      	 trigger: 'hover',
         delay: 0,
         speed: 0,
         position: 'left',
         onlyOne: true,
         offsetX: 8,
         offsetY: 0,
         animation: 'fade',
         maxWidth: 245,
         contentAsHTML: true,
         functionBefore: function (origin, continueTooltip){
         	continueTooltip();
          origin.tooltipster('content', $(this).parents("li").find(".insight").html());
         }
      });
      // make the view toggle work
      $(".tool.views a").click(function(ev){
      	var viewType = $(this).attr("href").toLowerCase().replace("#","");
        var removeThisClass ="";
        var $contents = $(".catalog .contents");
        
        if (viewType == "grid"){
          $contents.removeClass("list").addClass("grid"); //.find("ul").removeClass("medium-block-grid-1").addClass("medium-block-grid-4");
          VHXJS.enableTooltips();
          VHXJS._cleanupCatalog();
        } else {
        	$contents.removeClass("grid").addClass("list");// .find("ul").removeClass("medium-block-grid-4").addClass("medium-block-grid-1");
          VHXJS.disableTooltips();
          VHXJS._releaseCatalogHeights();
        }
        $(".tool.views a").removeClass("selected");
        $(this).addClass("selected");
        
        ev.preventDefault;
      });
    },
    _cleanupCatalog: function(){
    	var catalogHeight = 0;
      $("#catalogList li").each(function(ind){
      	if ($(this).outerHeight() > catalogHeight){
        	catalogHeight = $(this).outerHeight();
        }
      }).css("height",catalogHeight);
    },
    _releaseCatalogHeights: function(){
    	$("#catalogList li").css("height","auto");
    },
    enableTooltips: function() {
    	$('.catalog a.tooltipster').tooltipster('enable');
    },
    disableTooltips: function() {
  	  $('.catalog a.tooltipster').tooltipster('disable');
    },
    _setupPagination: function(){
       $(".catalog .paginator .padding").jPages({
  		    containerID : "catalogList",
          perPage: VHXJS.catalogItemsPerPage,
          first: false,
          last: false,
          next: "Next",
          previous: false,
          animation: false,
          fallback: 0,
          delay: 0,
          callback: function(pages, items){
          	// kill pagination if only one page exists
            if (pages.count <= 1){
            	$(".paginator").hide();
            }
          }
    		});
    },
    _destroyPagination: function(){
  		$(".catalog .paginator .padding").jPages("destroy");
    },
    componentToHex: function(c) {
      var hex = c.toString(16);
      return hex.length == 1 ? "0" + hex : hex;
  	}, 
    rgbToHex: function(r, g, b) {
      return "#" + VHXJS.componentToHex(r) + VHXJS.componentToHex(g) + VHXJS.componentToHex(b);
  	},  
    _setupVignette: function() {
      var colour = $("body").css("background-color");    
      colour = colour.replace("rgb(","");
      colour = colour.replace(")","");
      colour = colour.replace(/ /g,"");
      colourArr = colour.split(",");
      var bgHex = VHXJS.rgbToHex(parseInt(colourArr[0]),parseInt(colourArr[1]),parseInt(colourArr[2]));
      
      // $('.test').css({ 'background': '-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom,from(#f4f4f4),to(#FFFFFF))' });
      // build the before gradient
      var prefixes = new Array("-moz-linear-","-webkit-linear-","-o-linear-","-ms-linear-","linear-");
      var beforestr, afterstr = "";
      var beforedir = "top";
      var afterdir = "left";
      for(var i =0;i<=prefixes.length-1;i++){
        if (i == prefixes.length-1){
          beforedir = "to bottom";
          afterdir = "to right";
        } 
        // before = bottom 
        // after = sides
        beforestr = prefixes[i]+"gradient("+beforedir+",  rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",0) 0%, rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",1) 100%)";
        //afterstr = prefixes[i]+"gradient("+afterdir+",  rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",1) 0%, rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",1) 5%, rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",0) 21%, rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",0) 76%, rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",1) 95%, rgba("+colourArr[0]+","+colourArr[1]+","+colourArr[2]+",1) 100%)"
        
        $(".vignette.bottom").css("background",beforestr);
        //$(".vignette.after").css("background",afterstr);
      }
    },

       $('.scroll').live('click',function(event) {

          var target = $(this).attr('href').replace("/#","");

           if ($("body").hasClass("open")){
           	VHXJS.__closeMobileNav();

        });

  				pos = 0;
       }
       else {

  		 }
              
  		$('body,html').animate({scrollTop: pos+'px'}, 500, function(){

  		});
    },
    _setupSearch: function(){

          $("#searchform").autoSuggest(packages,{
            matchCase: false,
            minChars: 2,
            selectionLimit: 1,
            startText: $("#searchform").attr("placeholder"),
            emptyText: "Sorry, no results!",
            selectedItemProp: "title", 
            searchObjProps: "title",
            neverSubmit: true,
            resultsHighlight: false, 
            retrieveLimit: 10,
            retrieveComplete: function(data){
              //Custom function that is run after the ajax request has completed.
            },
            selectionAdded: function(elem){ 
              // hide the "tags" this wants to add by default
              elem.hide();
            },
            beforeRetrieve: function(string){
              // Custom function that is run right before the AJAX request is made, or before the local objected is searched.
              $(".catalog .contents li").removeClass("result").removeClass("hidden");
              // MUST RETURN THE STRING
              return string;
            },
            resultClick: function(data){ 
              // Custom function that is run when a search result item is clicked. 
              VHXJS.searchResultClick(data); 
             },
             resultsComplete: function(data){
               // Custom function that is run when the suggestion results dropdown list is made visible.
               $(".catalog .contents li").not(".result").addClass("hidden");
                $(".noresults").hide();
                
               if ($(".catalog .contents li.result").length){
                 VHXJS._destroyPagination();
               } else {
                VHXJS._showNoSearchResults();
               }
    
             },
            formatList: function(data, elem){
              //Custom function that is run after all the data has been retrieved and before the results are put into the suggestion results list. 
              // This is here so you can modify what & how things show up in the suggestion results list.
              //console.log(data);
              // hide everything that is NOT the ID's coming down the pipe
              $(".catalog .contents li[rel='"+data.sku+"']").addClass("result");
              var my_image = data.image;
              var new_elem = elem.html(data.name);
              return new_elem;
            }
          });
        }); //packages json
  			
        // listen to the new input
        $(document).on('keydown',function(event){
        	clearTimeout(VHXJS.searchValueInt);
          VHXJS.searchValueInt = setTimeout(function(){ VHXJS.checkSearchValue(event); }, 200);			
        });
        
      }
    },
    checkSearchValue: function(event){
    	// if the search form is blank, reset it
  		// if the input field has a length of ONE and the backspace key was pressed, they deleted that value 
    	// show em all if that's the case
    	VHXJS.searchInputValue = $(".tool.search .as-input").val()
      if (((VHXJS.searchInputValue.length == 1) && (event.which == 8)) || (VHXJS.searchInputValue == "")){
          	$(".catalog .contents li").removeClass("result").removeClass("hidden");
            VHXJS._setupPagination();
            $(".noresults").hide();

      // use the data passed in to populate a detail view!
    },

    	$(".noresults").fadeIn("fast");
    },

  /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
  /* TUMBLR */
  /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
  // RETRIEVES TUMBLR DATA
  if ($("#tumblog").length > 0){
  	getTumblog($("#tumblog").data("tumblr"),"#tumblog");
  }
  
  function getTumblog(username, target){
  	
  	var tumblrkey = "mhg6b9xFS5pGZr9inve9sSsa0Zl2zy4ojb3K7Ta3aWswFqqSU8";
    var tumblruser = username + ".tumblr.com";
    var endpoint = "http://api.tumblr.com/v2/blog/" + tumblruser + "/posts/";
    var postlimit = 50;
    if ($(target).data("tumblr-limit")){
    	postlimit = $(target).data("tumblr-limit");
    }
    var data = {
        api_key: tumblrkey,
        type: "photo",
        limit: postlimit
      };
      
    setTimeout(function() {
    
        $.ajax({
          type: "GET",
          url: endpoint,
          dataType: "jsonp",
          data: data
        })
        .done(function(returnData) {
  			 	processTumblog(returnData, username, target);
  			});
        
      }, 500);
  }
  // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
  // PARSES TUMBLR DATA INTO ARRAY
  function processTumblog(data, username, target){
   var usernamesafe = username.replace(/-/g,'');
  	var html = '<div id="tumblr_'+usernamesafe+'"><ul id="blog-entries"></ul></div>';
   var totalPosts = data.response.total_posts;
   
   $(target).html(html);
   
   if (data.meta.status == 200) {
  
       var feed = {
         url: 'http://' + username + '.tumblr.com',
         posts: []
       };
  
       $(data.response.posts).each(function(i, post) {
  
         switch (post.type){
           case "text":
             feed.posts.push({
               text: {
                 title: post.title,
                 body: post.body
               }
             });
             break;
  
           case "photo":
             var photos = [];
             $(post.photos).each(function(i, obj){
               photos.push({
                 photo_url: obj.alt_sizes[1].url // 500px wide
               })
             });
  
             feed.posts.push({
               photo: {
                 caption: post.caption,
                 photos: photos
               }
             });
             break;
  
           case "quote":
             feed.posts.push({
               quote: {
                 type: post.type,
                 tags: post.tags,
                 text: post.text,
                 source: post.source
               }
             });
             break;
  
           case "link":
             feed.posts.push({
               link: {
                 linkURL: post.url,
                 title: post.title,
                 description: post.description
               }
             });
             break;
  
           case "chat":
             var chat_log = post.body.split("\n");
             feed.posts.push({
               chat: {
                 title: post.title,
                 body: post.body,
                 chat: chat_log,
                 dialogue: post.dialogue
               }
             });
             break;
  
           case "audio":
             feed.posts.push({
               audio: {
                 source_title: post.source_title,
                 source_url: post.source_url,
                 id3_title: post.id3_title,
                 caption: post.caption,
                 audio_player: post.player,
                 audio_plays: post.plays,
                 artist: post.artist,
                 album: post.album,
                 track_name: post.track_name,
                 track_num: post.track_num,
                 year: post.year
               }
             });
             break;
  
           case "video":
             feed.posts.push({
               video: {
                 source_title: post.source_title,
                 caption: post.caption,
                 video_embed: post.player[2].embed_code
               }
             });
             break;
  
           case "answer":
             feed.posts.push({
               answer: {
                 asking_name: post.asking_name,
                 asking_url: post.asking_url,
                 question: post.question,
                 answer: post.answer
               }
             });
             break;
  					
  
           default:
             feed.posts.push({
               title: post.title,
               body: post.body
             });
         } // end switch
  			       
         feed.posts[feed.posts.length - 1].date = post.date.substr(0,10);
         feed.posts[feed.posts.length - 1].tags = post.tags;
         feed.posts[feed.posts.length - 1].timestamp = post.timestamp;
         feed.posts[feed.posts.length - 1].url = post.post_url;
         feed.posts[feed.posts.length - 1].type = post.type;
         feed.posts[feed.posts.length - 1].note_count = post.note_count;
       }); // end each
       
       // make the output
       createTumblrHTML(feed, username, totalPosts);
      
  	} // end if
  } // end function
  // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
  // PARSES ARRAY OUT INTO STANDARD HTML
  function createTumblrHTML(data, username, totalPosts){
  	var thehtml ="";
    
    $(data.posts).each(function(i, post) {
      
      switch (post.type){
       // this is the only style we use for this theme, others listed here for legacy
       // this is a stinted version - meant to be limited in view
        case "photo":
          /* V2 */
          thehtml += '<div class="entry photo">';
          thehtml += '	<a href="'+post.url+'" style="background-image:url(\''+post.photo.photos[0].photo_url+'\');"></a>';
          thehtml += '	<div class="caption">'+post.photo.caption+'</div>';
          thehtml += '</div>';
         
         	/* ORIGINAL 
           thehtml +='<div class="entry photo">';
           thehtml += '   <div class="photos">';
  				 $(post.photo.photos).each(function(j, thephoto){
           	thehtml += ' <img src="'+thephoto.photo_url+'" />';
           });
           thehtml += '  </div>';
           thehtml +=  '	<div class="caption">'+post.photo.caption+'</div>';
           thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
           thehtml += '</div>';
        */
          break;
          
          
      	case "text":
        	 thehtml +='<div class="entry text">';
           thehtml +='   <h2><a href="'+post.url+'">'+post.text.title+'</a></h2>';
           thehtml +=	'		<div class="caption">'+post.text.body+'</div>';
           thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
           thehtml +=' </div>';
        	break;
      
       
        
        
   			case "quote":
        	 thehtml +='<div class="entry quote">';
           thehtml +='   <h2>'+post.quote.text+'</h2>';
           thehtml +='   <p class="source">'+post.quote.source+'</p>';
           thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
           thehtml +=' </div>';
        	break;
          
        case "link":
        	thehtml +='<div class="entry link">';
          thehtml +='    <h2><a href="'+post.link.linkURL+'">'+post.link.title+'</a></h2>';
          thehtml +=		post.link.description;
          thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
          thehtml +='</div>';
        	break;
        
        case "chat":
        	thehtml +=' <div class="entry chat">';
          thehtml +='    <h2><a href="'+post.url+'">'+post.chat.title+'</a></h2>';
          thehtml +='    <ul>';
          $(post.chat.chat).each(function(k, chatter){
          thehtml +='        <li>'+chatter+'</li>';
          });
          thehtml +='    </ul>';
          thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
          thehtml +='  </div>';
        	break;
       	
        case "audio":
        	thehtml +=' <div class="entry audio">';
          thehtml +='    <div class="player">'+post.audio.audio_player+'</div>';
          thehtml +=			post.audio.caption;
          thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
          thehtml +='  </div>';
        	break;
          
        case "video":
        	thehtml +=' <div class="entry video">';
          thehtml +='    <div class="thevideo">'+post.video.video_embed+'</div>';
          thehtml +=			post.video.caption;
          thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
          thehtml +='  </div>';
  	      break;
        
        case "answer":
        	thehtml += ' <div class="entry answer">';
          thehtml += '    <div class="query"><h3>'+post.answer.question+'<h3>';
          thehtml += '		&mdash; '+post.answer.asking_name+'</div>';
          thehtml += '		<div class="response"><p>'+post.answer.answer+'</p></div>';
          thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
          thehtml += '  </div>';
        	break;             
          
        default:
       	  thehtml +='<div class="entry text">';
           thehtml +='   <h2><a href="'+post.url+'">'+post.title+'</a></h2>';
           thehtml +=			post.body;
           thehtml += 		createTumblrMeta(post, username);
           thehtml +=' </div>';
           
           
                              
  		} // end switch
  	});// end each
    
   /*if (totalPosts > 10){
  	 thehtml += '<a class="readmore button" href="http://'+username+'.tumblr.com/page/2/" target="_blank">Read More</a>';
   } else {
   	thehtml += '<a class="readmore button" href="http://'+username+'.tumblr.com/#noredirect" target="_blank">Read More</a>';
   }*/
   
   var usernamesafe = username.replace(/-/g,'');
   
   $('#tumblr_' + usernamesafe).hide();
   $('#tumblr_' + usernamesafe).html(thehtml);
   $('#tumblr_' + usernamesafe).fadeIn(500);
        
  } // end createTumblrHTML
  
  // helper function to make the tumblr meta info
  function createTumblrMeta(post, username){
  	var thehtml = '';
    if (post.tags.length >0){  
    	thehtml += createTumblrTags(post.tags,username);	 
    }
  	thehtml += '	<div class="timestamp"><a class="datetime" href="'+post.url+'">';
    thehtml += '		<i class="icon-time"></i> Posted '+post.date+'</a>';
    thehtml += '		<a class="likecount" href="'+post.url+'">';
    thehtml += '		<i class="icon-heart"></i> ';
    if (post.note_count){
    thehtml += 			post.note_count;
    }
    thehtml += 			'</a>';
    thehtml += '	</div>';
    
    
    
    return thehtml;
  }
  // helper function to make linked tags
  function createTumblrTags(tags,tumblrUsername){
  	var returnhtml = "<div class='tags'>";
  	for (var i=0;i<=tags.length-1;i++){
    	returnhtml += "<a href='http://tumblr.com/tagged/"+tags[i]+"'>#"+tags[i]+"</a>";
    }
    returnhtml += "</div>";
    return returnhtml;
  }
  
      });
    </script>
